name: Characternik
description:
Made for 7daysDungeonCrawler GameJam 2021. 

RPG based on slavic myphos and tales of ukrainian mystical cossacks "Characterniks".

Inspired by novels of N. Gogol and A. Tolstoy.

Controls: A - turn left, D - turn right, W - forward S - backward, Q - strafe left E - strafe right, SPACE - pass turn, '+'and'-' buttons -  change volume level

DO NOT rush into large clusters of enemies! Use your head. Try to  lure out individual groups.

Music by "Reanimation" band, Odessa, Ukraine:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCSbZbFUytg2UdwJFxVtqjQ

https://www.facebook.com/reanimation.band.odessa/
